text: One last thing I'd add is to use video messaging in your process. Many video companies offer free trials. Use video to introduce yourself and explain why you'd be a good fit. You can also use video after your interview to thank the recruiter and/or hiring manager!

elements.text: One last thing I'd add is to use video messaging in your process. Many video companies offer free trials. Use video to introduce yourself and explain why you'd be a good fit. You can also use video after your interview to thank the recruiter and/or hiring manager!

text: I'd second everything Jessie mentioned. My 2 cents, try to nail down the ROI they are looking for from the position they want to fill. Make most of your sales pitch about how you'll help them hit their targets by showing them what you've done in the past. Fundamentally, you're paid to hit results. The qualities are the icing on the cake that employers consider when they are thinking about company fit.
